regions.name: North India
regions.description: People from North India, including states like Punjab, Uttar Pradesh, Haryana, and Delhi. Features often include fair to wheatish skin, dark hair, and sharp facial features.

regions.name: South India
regions.description: People from South India, including Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Karnataka, and Andhra Pradesh. Features often include medium to dark skin, thick black hair, and rounded facial features.

regions.name: East India
regions.description: People from Bengal, Odisha, Assam, and other eastern states. Features include wheatish to medium skin, dark hair, and soft facial features.

regions.name: West India
regions.description: People from Gujarat, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, and Goa. Features include fair to medium skin, dark hair, and diverse facial features.

regions.name: North East India
regions.description: People from the North Eastern states such as Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram, and Arunachal Pradesh. Features include light to medium skin, straight black hair, and East Asian facial features.

regions.name: Central India
regions.description: People from Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh. Features include medium to dark skin, dark hair, and a mix of North and South Indian features.
